active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, analyze how code signing could have mitigated the SolarWinds supply chain attack. Debate the trade-offs between convenience (e.g., unsigned open-source code) and security in modern software ecosystems.

Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
